mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, contents, profile_img, (select count(follower_id) from follow f1 where f1.user_id = p.user_id) as follower, (select count(user_id) from follow f2 where f2.follower_id = p.user_id) as following, (select count(tb.trav_b_no) from trav_board tb where tb.user_id = p.user_id) as board_count, manner_ondo from profile p where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE profile SET manner_ondo = #{manner_ondo} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
